casebody.data:
Elizabeth LUKE as Guardian ad Litem, For Jane Doe (a minor), Plaintiff,
v.
WOODLAWN SCHOOL, J. Robert Shirley individually and as Agent for Woodlawn School, and The Woodlawn School Board of Trustees, Defendants. No. COA18-1109 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: June 4, 2019

AFFIRMED IN PART. DISMISSED IN PART.
